name: Out/Last
description:
Catch up to yourself to eliminate yourself, but watch out: the walls you lit before you died will now turn deadly to avenge you.

WASD/IJKL/arrow keys to move all movable balls.

When text appears on screen, wait five seconds, then press any key to continue.

Play the game multiple times to try to beat your high score. (Possible scores range from -5 to 6.)
